law.catch_line: Policy development, supervision, management, and administration of Capital City Airport Division.

text.section: The commissioner of the department shall be responsible for overall policy development and supervision of the Capital City Airport Division.
A division director shall head the Capital City Airport Division within the Department of Aviation.

law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 13, sec. 17, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 605, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998.
